title: Is there a way to Club chat while in game?
body: Just curious if this is an option since club sizes aren't too big. If it isn't an option is there any possibility in the future to have it as a toggle able chat in game?

replies.body: It's not currently possible to access club chat while in a game.  As an alternative though, you might be able to use the club chat on your phone [friends app](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app) to club chat.  I haven't tested it myself, but technically it should work!  I hope that helps!
